message: I'm excited to offer you this valuable product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a unique item that will surely bring you a lot of value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,500. What do you think?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on this product.  While I'm interested, $11,500 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying at this time.  Would you be willing to consider $10,500?  I believe this price is fair, reflecting the value you've placed on the product and allowing for a mutually beneficial transaction.

I understand where you're coming from, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product. What do you think?
